Text:
Hi Guys & Gals,

Enjoy!

I am happy to share all my collection with you!

I very much appreciate all the efforts that you are deploying to keep the Fu alive by seeding these torrents, whenever possible and with the means that you have at your disposal, and I sincerely thank you all.

Together, let's keep the Fu alive, REGARDLESS OF THE CARYING BOAT!

If you happen to be an active seeders, please drop your hotmail email address so that other Fu Members could contact you for a possible reseed.

Let's keep it alive!
Ill' share it at least 5 times:)
Thank you! I'm really happy to find these movies! :)
exactly how is this film kung fu?  there is no kung fu in this film, seeing as how kung fu is chinese and this is a japanese film.
